quote: Her energy is contagious, it brings up everyone in the room
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: Would something like that make her feel better… OH, IT DID!
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: Get real. I’m not a baby you know. I can’t let my self freak out over every little thing forever
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: here are only two kinds of rock guitarists: Jeff Beck and everyone else
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: You’re crying too, you big hypocrite!
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: We’ll follow her BUTT and find out what kind of guy she’s dating!
author: Mio Akiyama
